reporting.reporttable.TableQuery:
SET @FromDate ={%DatabaseSchema%}.Func_Analytics_DateTrim(@FromDate,'month'); SET @ToDate ={%DatabaseSchema%}.Func_Analytics_EndDateTrim(@ToDate,'month');
SELECT TOP 100 ConversionDisplayName AS '{$reports_conversion.name_header$}', SUM(HitsCount) AS '{$reports_conversion.hits_header$}',SUM(HitsValue) AS '{$reports_conversion.value_header$}' FROM Analytics_Statistics JOIN Analytics_MonthHits ON HitsStatisticsID = StatisticsID JOIN Analytics_Conversion ON ConversionName = StatisticsObjectName AND ConversionSiteID = @CMSContextCurrentSiteID WHERE (StatisticsSiteID = @CMSContextCurrentSiteID) AND (StatisticsCode=N'conversion') AND (StatisticsID = HitsStatisticsID) AND (HitsStartTime >= @FromDate) AND (@ConversionName IS NULL OR @ConversionName IN ('',StatisticsObjectName)) AND (HitsEndTime <= @ToDate) GROUP BY ConversionDisplayName ORDER BY SUM(HitsCount) DESC
